i01_torch.name: Torch
i01_torch.desc: A torch, useful for lighting up rooms.

i02_smallhealthpot.name: Small Health Potion
i02_smallhealthpot.desc: Using this regenerates your health by 25.

i03_largehealthpot.name: Large Health Potion
i03_largehealthpot.desc: Using this regenerates your health by 50.

i04_rustysword.name: Rusty sword
i04_rustysword.desc: A rusty old sword, left here by previous adventurers.

i06_neymarsshinpads.name: Neymar's Shinpads
i06_neymarsshinpads.desc: Shinpads worn by Neymar, they increases your chances of evading an attack.

i07_thorshammer.name: Thor's Hammer
i07_thorshammer.desc: A hammer imbued with the powers of the God of Lightning, Thor.

i08_voidwyrmscalemail.name: Voidwyrm Scalemail
i08_voidwyrmscalemail.desc: Armour made from the scales of a Voidwyrm, a beast residing in the deep Void.

i09_killmongersvambraces.name: Killmonger's Vambraces
i09_killmongersvambraces.desc: Killmonger's vambraces, they increases your chances of evading an attack.

i10_edwardskatana.name: Edward's Katana
i10_edwardskatana.desc: A katana that was left by Edward Kenway, it is a powerful weapon.

i11_cloakofevasion.name: Cloak of Evasion
i11_cloakofevasion.desc: A cloak make of ethereal silk, increases your chances of evading an attack.

i12_key.name: Normal Room Key
i12_key.desc: This key can unlock all doors but the boss door. Single use.

i13_bosskey.name: Boss Room Key
i13_bosskey.desc: This key can be used to open the boss door. Who lies behind it?
